Reference

Data

Example datasets

sampling_areas

Areas of interest where sampling points were generated

sampling_points

Sampling points where animal surveys were conducted

animal_surveys

Animal surveys conducted at sampling points

animal_observations

Animal observation records from point surveys

Animal surveys

Get, process and summarise data from animal surveys

random_pt_gen()

Randomly generate sampling points within supplied area

filter_obs()

Filter species observations based on specified criteria

sptally_extractor()

Tally number of species based on specified criteria

check_taxongrps()

Check taxon-group-level records in survey data

exclude_simulator()

Simulate multiple scenarios with animal surveys randomly excluded

sac_extractor()

Extract species accumulation curves based on specified criteria

Landscapes

Get, process and summarise landscape data at survey locations

mosaic_sen2r()

Create mosaics of Sentinel-2 images downloaded via the sen2r package

classify_image_binary()

Binary classification of a single-band image based on a threshold value

threshold_otsu()

Calculate pixel value threshold of a single-band image via Otsu's method

lsm_perpoint()

Calculate landscape metrics at sampling points

get_roads_osm()

Get road lines from OpenStreetMap

get_buildings_osm()

Get building polygons from OpenStreetMap

Models

Predict and validate animal diversity

summarise_landscape_perpt()

Summarise landscape variables per point based on supplied data
